title: FS: Tolstoi Mordecai Brown Chicago on Shirt SGC 82 **SOLD**

posts.post_title: FS: Tolstoi Mordecai Brown Chicago on Shirt SGC 82 **SOLD**
posts.post_content: Extremely clean Tolstoi back. Slight touch on bottom left corner keeps this card from a much higher grade, other three corners are razor sharp.....$1650 delivered. Final offer at $1550, thanks..
